name: Just Dance Kids
description:
Just Dance, the #1 selling Music &Rhythm game for the Wii system from Nintendo, is now available FOR KIDS! With a HUGE selection of their favorite songs, crazy dances and all-new kid-friendly game play, children of all ages can Just Dance, along with the rest of the family!

Features

• Over 40 fun dances led by real kids!
• Featuring the biggest pop hits, including ‘One Time’
• Young kids dance to favorite TV shows like The Wiggles
• Pick- up-and-play; all you need is the Wii Remote!
